name: ShareMeow
description: a Ruby microservice (ooh ahh) for creating super shareable, tweetable, facebook-able images from your content :heart_eyes_cat:.

SHARE_MEOW_SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key used for authentication.

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of Puma processes to run.

MAX_THREADS.description: The number of Puma threads to run per process.
